trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>By reconditioning the Resistance weapon, you can redistribute the attribute points allocated to your weapon.

TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_MEMORIZESYSTEM_000_001<tab>Reapplication of aetheroinsulation coating requires <var 20 E803 /var> phials of aetherial sealant. House of Splendors representatives are standing by, and ready to take your order!
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Aetherial sealant can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>By supplying the Allagan node with aetherial sealant, you may raise the four available attributes of your Resistance weapon as you see fit.

TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>When you are satisfied with the allotment of attributes, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Allocate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to complete the process.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>Choose carefully, as redistribution of attributes will require the procurement of additional sealant.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_MEMORIZESYSTEM_000_190<tab><blip> <blip> Unable to process request. Insufficient aetherial sealant.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_MEMORIZESYSTEM_000_200<tab><blip> <blip> Unable to process request. Incompatible weapon detected. Please verify the correct weapon is equipped before placing next request.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You may only recondition your currently equipped Resistance weapon when accessing the Allagan node.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_MEMORIZESYSTEM_000_300<tab><blip> Suspending weapon recondition protocol. Entering standby mode...
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_MEMORIZESYSTEM_000_600<tab><blip> Scanning registry... Readying memories for extraction... <blip> <blip> Reapplying aetheroinsulation coating... Reconditioning protocol complete.
TEXT_LUCKSA299_04041_SYSTEM_000_601<tab>The Resistance weapon has been transformed, gaining newfound strength!
